title: Why Did You Come to Japan?
overview: Hosted by the comedic duo "Bananaman", the programme features teams of interviewers following close reporting around various locations in Japan, asking non-Japanese people the golden question, "Why did you come to Japan?" Each episode is packed with surprises and introduces many parts of Japanese culture that attracts foreign tourists , some of which even the Japanese natives themselves were not aware of. Keep your eyes out the next time you visit Japan, who knows you might be approached by the interview team at the airport?
